subject: Re: [junit] Want to say thank you!
msgSnippet: Congratulations! I can t imagine writing software any other way, and when I m forced to do that, I become very uncomfortable. You re welcome. Thank you for
messageBody:
Congratulations! I can't imagine writing software any other way, and
when I'm forced to do that, I become very uncomfortable.

You're welcome. Thank you for your contributions to this group, as
well.

*********** REPLY SEPARATOR ***********

On 2002-08-14 at 07:47 Bernd wrote:

>Hi everybody on this list,
>
>yesterday I finished my third junit-test-first project.
>
>It is amazing: The software runs as expected after deployed
>on the clients site :) I have never seen this before ;)
>
>Thank you all again for your ideas and the time spent sharing this
>ideas!
>
>Bernd
>
